opportunities.title: Right-size EC2 Instances
opportunities.description: 18 instances across Kenya and Nigeria regions are over-provisioned. Analysis shows 25% of capacity unused during peak hours.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Migrate to smaller instance types during maintenance window. Schedule for weekend deployment.

opportunities.title: Purchase Reserved Instances
opportunities.description: Convert 25 on-demand instances to 1-year reserved instances for stable workloads in production environments.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Purchase reserved instances for AccountingPro Suite and CdfWebApp workloads

opportunities.title: Implement Spot Instances
opportunities.description: Use spot instances for batch processing, data analytics, and non-critical workloads. Potential 60-70% cost savings.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Migrate batch jobs and reporting workloads to spot instance fleet with fallback to on-demand

opportunities.title: Optimize Storage Tiers
opportunities.description: Move 3.5TB of infrequently accessed data to cheaper storage tiers. Implement lifecycle policies for automated transitions.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Implement lifecycle policies for S3 buckets. Transition data older than 90 days to Glacier

opportunities.title: Remove Unused Resources
opportunities.description: 12 EBS volumes, 7 load balancers, and 15 elastic IPs are no longer in use across all regions.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Audit and remove unused resources. Create automated cleanup scripts to prevent future waste

opportunities.title: Optimize Database Licensing
opportunities.description: Switch from commercial database licenses to open-source alternatives where appropriate. PostgreSQL migration opportunity identified.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Migrate non-critical databases to PostgreSQL. Keep mission-critical systems on current platform

opportunities.title: Implement Auto-Scaling
opportunities.description: Configure auto-scaling policies to match capacity with actual demand. Current static provisioning leads to 40% waste during off-peak hours.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Implement auto-scaling groups with scale-down during nights and weekends

opportunities.title: Consolidate Data Transfer
opportunities.description: Optimize data transfer between regions. Reduce cross-region traffic by implementing regional caching.
opportunities.recommendedAction: Deploy CloudFront distributions and regional caching layers
